title: The Levite’s Concubine
summary: Judges 19 tells a horrific story of a Levite and his concubine. While staying in Gibeah, wicked men assault her, and she dies. The Levite dismembers her body and sends the pieces throughout Israel to rally the tribes against the sin.

faq.question: What tragic event happens in Gibeah?
faq.answer: The Levite’s concubine is abused and dies from the attack.

faq.question: Why does the Levite send her body parts to the tribes?
faq.answer: To shock Israel into action and expose the wickedness that occurred in Gibeah.
